description: A startup script to initialize, configure, and start PostgreSQL database with schema and seed data. It sets up roles, permissions, checks if the database is running, initializes the data directory if needed, and applies schema and seed SQL files.

methods.name: run_psql_super
methods.description: Helper function to run psql as the postgres user with error stopping.

methods.name: run_psql_super_appdb
methods.description: Helper function to run psql against the application's database as postgres.
